item.title: [PI] ::command - want it to only let 2 people in + rights = 3
item.dc:creator: @turm0ilz-pkz turm0ilz-pkz
item.description:
@turm0ilz-pkz wrote:

Try this

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“command”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Name”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Name”)) {
c.teleportToX = 3333;
c.teleportToY = 3333;
c.sendMessage(“Welcome”);

}[/code]

if you want the owner to be able to access it find

and put it underneath it along with the other codes.

item.title: [PI] ::command - want it to only let 2 people in + rights = 3
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Dobbs Mod Dobbs
item.description:
@Mod_Dobbs wrote:

Title kinda says it all.

I was a command which is a teleport, but I wanted it so that only 2 people in the game can access it aswell as the owner - playerRights == 3.

This is what I have so far.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("command") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name")           c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("name2){
c.teleportToX = 3333;
c.teleportToY = 3333;
c.sendMessage("Welcome");

}

Read full topic
